text: Nimen de funu zhong dui yuejing yi juewang zhe [yiguo gengnianqi zhe], jiaru nimen huaiyi [tamen], name, tamen de dai hun qi shi san ge yue, shangwei lai yuejing zhe â‘¡[wei chengnian zhe] ye yiyang. Huaiyun zhe de qi xian shi tamen de fenmian qi man. Shei jingwei an la, ta [an la] bi shi shei de shiwu rongyi.
